targets.query: SELECT "confirmed_cumulative" FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

select sum(b) / sum(a) * 100 from (select a, b from (select sum(c) as a from (SELECT last("confirmed_cumulative") as c FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" != 'None') GROUP BY "country" order by time desc LIMIT 1) order by time desc), (SELECT "confirmed_cumulative" as b FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) order by time desc) order by time desc;
SELECT "death_cumulative" FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT 100*"death_cumulative" / "confirmed_cumulative" FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "recovered_cumulative" FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT 100*"recovered_cumulative" / "confirmed_cumulative" FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "confirmed_cumulative" - "death_cumulative" - "recovered_cumulative" FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "severe_cumulative" FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

select 100* mean(a) / mean(b) from (SELECT "severe_cumulative" as a FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT ("confirmed_cumulative" - "death_cumulative" - "recovered_cumulative") as b FROM "worldometers" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) order by time desc;

list.definition: select distinct(country) from (select country, confirmed_cumulative from worldometers) ;
list.label: country
list.name: country
list.query: select distinct(country) from (select country, confirmed_cumulative from worldometers) ;
